Reviews.Title: Warm and cuddly  :-)
Reviews.Author: Scuba Doc
Reviews.Content: Good solid case - provides full functionality of the camera while in the case (must activate "case mode" in camera menus before putting in the case).  Excellent quality, and quite stylish appearance.  Much less bulky than generic cases.

Reviews.Title: Sony MPKTHJ DSC Marine Pack and Sony DSC-TX10  THEY DON'T WORK TOGETHER FOR SURE
Reviews.Author: Manoel Cifuentes
Reviews.Content: I own both the Sony MPKTHJ DSC Marine Pack and Sony DSC-TX10 and THEY DON'T WORK TOGETHER FOR SURE y also have DSC-TX5 and this one really works with this marine pack.

Reviews.Title: Sony Marine Pack MPK-THJ for DSC-TX5 and DSC-TX9
Reviews.Author: George Wey
Reviews.Content: I love the quality of all Sony products. This housing is perfect for protecting your camera in harsh environments and still compact enough to have fun snorkeling with. I have Sport Packs and Marine Packs for all my Sony Cameras and Camcorders.Marine Pack for: DSC-TX5 and DSC-TX9Sport Pack for: HDR-CX7 and HDR-CX350VI would highly recommend a marine pack for cameras or sport pack for camcorders to any one who owns a Sony product. Quality and functionality is outstanding!

Reviews.Title: A wonderful product for diving lovers
Reviews.Author: abdulrhman
Reviews.Content: I Abdulrahman from LibyaI bought a piece of this product and very much enjoyed filming in the DepthsThank itemsThanks to Amazon

Reviews.Title: Waterproof?
Reviews.Author: sweetapple
Reviews.Content: I bought this waterproof case while I was living in Hawaii so I could take pictures while snorkeling. The first time I took it out it leaked and destroyed my camera. Thankfully I had insurance and was able to replace it. I was super worried taking it out again. I followed the directions step by step and tested it several times before trying again. I took it out and watched it carefully for signs of leakage and sure enough it leaked again. I got it out of the water before it could do anymore damage. Terrible product, just buy a camera that's made to go underwater because this case is super high maintenance  and doesn't even work. What a waste.

Reviews.Title: So excited!!
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my upcoming trip to Hawaii and I can't wait to use it. I haven't tested it out yet but it coming from Sony, I have no doubts of its reliability. It seems to be built very sturdy and comes with a set of dessicant packets which is a plus! I use it with my Sony Cybershot DSC-T110... It comes with 3 different adapters to fit other cybershot cameras. The adapter that works with my camera doesn't allow you to use every function of the camera (like if I want to switch modes I have to change it before placing it into the device). I can't even access the zoom in/out outside of the device which is a big bummer but I'll get over it. Overall, great product. Can't wait to see how my pictures turn out!

Reviews.Title: Solid Sony unit, but almost unusable
Reviews.Author: David Daberkoe
Reviews.Content: The plexi that covers the viewfinder is TINTED!  I've only used it once underwater, but I could not see a thing on the screen, which is very important close up.  How has no one mentioned this deal killer?

Reviews.Title: Perfect Scuba Pictures and Videos With This Marine Pack
Reviews.Author: Kaliber
Reviews.Content: I have logged several dives with this housing and my TX-5.  I am so happy with this investment.  The case is absolutely solid and feels great in my hands.  Its not bulky at all.

Reviews.Title: WOW!
Reviews.Author: Thomas S. Cooper
Reviews.Content: This is the best buy in marine photography.  This is my second Sony camera with the underwater housing.  They take better pictures than the dedicated marine cameras costing 3 times as much, plus during the 99% of the time when you're not diving, you have a top quality camera that is the size of a deck of cards.

Reviews.Title: Great case...worth the $$$
Reviews.Author: Outdoor Junkies
Reviews.Content: My husband and I bought this case since we've been doing a lot of beach vacations and missing out on underwater pics. So before our trip to Kauai we decided to do some research on water cameras. We already have the Sony DSC-TX7 so we also researched this case and decided after many good reviews to purchase.I made sure to read the manual from beginning to end since I read that some people didn't do as such and did not get good results. I did exactly as the manual suggests and had absolutely no problems with my camera getting wet and the picture/video quality is awesome. The sound on video isn't that great but then again your camera is inside the case. Also to mention, if there are water drops on the lens then you will get water drops in your pic. This is the only issue...but not really much of an issue. We have absolutely no regrets. Also make sure to soak it in fresh water after using in salt. I dried it off and took out my camera, then closed it back and soaked it.

Reviews.Title: Great product for the buck!
Reviews.Author: Iva
Reviews.Content: I've researched underwater cameras and marine packs for months!I'm a scuba diver so I wanted a good product,that's going to last me years,without paying a thousand dollars!I'm extremely happy with my choice-the Sony MPKTHJ DSC and the Sony TX-9:) I first bought the sony TX-10 to put in this pack,but as other reviews pointed out-they don't work together! Anyways I've used the pack on many dives now and all my pictures are surprisingly great!I would recommend it to anybody!

Reviews.Title: Sony Marine Pack
Reviews.Author: R. J. Hoover
Reviews.Content: Using the marine pack with a DSC-TX5.  Sony tech support has indicated that the unit will also work with the TX7 and TX9 -- but NOT with the TX10.Have had the unit down as far as 110' with no problems.Use with either the Sealife Moisture muncher 1.5 gram capsules or Sony's own desicant packs.

Reviews.Title: Sony DSC-TX7 Marine Case
Reviews.Author: Angevine
Reviews.Content: This little item is a must have if you want to be on/near/under the water and you want to take pictures. The Sony DSC-TX7 Digital Camera it houses is so intelligent that it actually has an UnderWater setting built into it to ensure that your picture quality is still good.If you spend time on the beach it will ensure that your camera is none the worse for wear and will come home still working.
